name: zkcredential-access-hub
description: Fullstack dApp for ZkCredential Access Hub on Midnight Blockchain

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd src/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd src/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd src/backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.compile:contracts: cd contracts && compact compile CredentialRegistry.compact compiled/ && compact compile ProofVerifier.compact compiled/
scripts.clean: rm -rf src/backend/dist src/frontend/.next src/frontend/out node_modules src/backend/node_modules src/frontend/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run compile:contracts
